Description.Name: Why are we waiting?
Description.Details:
You arrive on the bridge and head over to talk to Darius, "Darius, remind me again, what is the status on the Console?"  

Darius quickly types some info into the computer station he is standing at, "I believe Dr Murad is just waiting on your authorisation as she estimates total costs to be under ¢2,000,000 C-Bills and will take 14 days."

You nod, deep in thought.

After a pronounced period of silence, Darius interupts you, "Commander, do you want to have the Console repaired?"

Description.Name: Fix the Console
Description.Details:
Startled by Darius' question, you take a minute before responding, "Sorry, I was doing the budget in my head.  Have Farah and her team begin the repairs on the console."
Darius turns to the computer to type up the work order, "On to it, Commander."

Description.Name: Delay Console Repair
Description.Details:
You respond to Darius, "Thank you, Darius.  I think we should..."

Darius interrupts you, "Uh, Commander... it appears we are actually missing some spare parts for the repairs.  We are completely out of [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_KerbyInjectors],Kerby Injectors]]."

You look at Darius, shaking your head, "Seriously?  Why didn't you say that when I asked you about the delay in the first place?  You know what, don't answer that.  See if we can find some of those Pirate contracts so we can obtain more parts."

Darius nods, "Yes, Commander.  I'm sure we will eventually need some more [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_CheatahNavComputer],Cheatah Nav Computers]] and [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_FuCapacitor],Fu Capacitors]] as well.
